RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 19, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY MARVEL sped off from the break carrying a commanding lead through the turn into upper stretch finishing as much the best. BELLA BASORA went evenly off the pace finding a belated move along the rail in the late going to save place. DEVILISH MAGIC chased a loose leader to upper stretch weakening late. SHEZAGOLDGETTER raced evenly lacking more. SUGAR BRITCHES paused missing the break. SMOOTH RITHMS was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Devilish Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased loose leader, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Marvel
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, sped off on lead, well clear lane, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Shezagoldgetter
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Basora
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, mild rally late along the rail, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Rithms
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Britches
ENTRY.COMMENT: missed the break

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 19 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY BATON ROUGE broke sharply to a clear lead drawing off on the turn being ridden out the final sixteenth. CONSTITUTIONALIST chased the pace losing ground to the leader on the turn proving no match down the lane staying after it to secure place. BAY OF ANGELS slow early saved ground to upper stretch giving a mild rally along the rail. SECRET SEDUCTION chased the pace through the turn weakening along the inside the final eighth. QUITCHERSNIVELIN slow early played no factor. TOP MULE raced mid pack tiring in upper stretch. CONDUTTORE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Constitutionalist
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, no match lane, secured place

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Seduction
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Top Mule
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: My Baton Rouge
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, drew off on turn, well clear lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Bay of Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally inside lane

ENTRY.NAME: Conduttore
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Quitchersnivelin
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 19, 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 19 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In E ligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVER KAT prompted the pace shaking clear on the far turn widening in upper stretch holding up under a drive. TEXTPECTATION slow early rallied on the far turn advancing from the inside to upper stretch angling out there closing the gap late. PARADE GRAND broke very slowly, raced well back to the far turn moving along the inside to upper stretch gaining some from the rail. BACK ALLEY CAT pressed early between horses then dropped on the backside angling wide in upper stretch laboring home. SOLITAIRE GAME prompted the early pace wavering near the quarter pole fading in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Back Alley Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early between, dropped off backside, angled wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: River Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, shook clear far turn, widened lane, held

ENTRY.NAME: Textpectation
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied far turn, inside move to lane, angled out

ENTRY.NAME: Parade Grand
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, well back early, inisde lane, rallied,

ENTRY.NAME: Solitaire Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, tired to lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 19 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA BRODY unhurried early fired on the far turn taking over in upper stretch drawing off under urging. TEQUILA SUNSET away alertly set a pressured pace being overpowered into upper stretch holding up for place. RAISE THE PRAISE was steadied when in close after the break, raced evenly rallying to contention on the far turn losing momentum in upper stretch finishing evenly. ALITTLESLICEOF PIE broke very slowly lagging through the backside, rallied to bid on the far turn then leveled off down the lane. MYRA FLEENER tracked the early pace giving way into the far turn. BIZZY GAL pressured the early pace then wilted on the far turn. BALLYKEEN pressed the early pace then folded abruptly on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Sunset
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, overpowered to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Raise the Praise
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied after break, rallied far turn, evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Ballykeen
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, folded abruptly far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Bizzy Gal
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wore out

ENTRY.NAME: Myra Fleener
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked early, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Alittlesliceof Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, gained on far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: La Brody
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, bold move far turn, drew off lane, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 19, 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 19 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YO YO MON advanced on the backside bidding three deep at the quarter pole clearing in upper stretch drawing out as much the best. MALIBU MARLEE broke slowly rushing to clear into the backside being hooked on the far turn ceding in upper stretch swinging out seven wide in mid stretch. HERE COMES JIGS slow early rallied on the far turn then was carried out in mid stretch steadying briefly before angling back inside. MACHTENHAIRONFIRE gained on the backside bidding along the inside to upper stretch weakening while fading late. MARIANNA QUEEN gave way on the far turn. AN OBJECTION FROM THE RIDER OF HERE COMES JIGS AGAINST THE RIDER OF MALIBU MARLEE FOR INTERFERENCE DURING THE STRETCH RUN WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Yo Mon
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, bid three deep 1/4, cleared top lane, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Machtenhaironfire
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, pressed inside to lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Marlee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, rushed clear, passed to lane, swung wide

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Jigs
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied far turn, carried out mid stretch, angled in

ENTRY.NAME: Marianna Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 19 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGIC MOUNTAIN sent clear set the pace drawing off in upper stretch holding firm to wire. QUICK ENTRY chased the pace to upper stretch proving no match there digging in along the inside to save place. PRETTY STORMY bumped after the break raced evenly to upper stretch rallying late to bid three deep. KICKSTARTER chased the pace to upper stretch extending in a place duel there being outbid late between horses. TEN TWENTY NINE slow early played no factor. I'M A COOL MAN was never involved. HIDDEN RULER was always outrun.

FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 19 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claim ing Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICE FLOE away alertly set the pace being pressed on both sides at the quarter pole digging deep to clear again in upper stretch holding firm to wire. GET A GRIP MARILYN vied three deep at the quarter pole extending into upper stretch remaining responsive there though second best. U SO MONEY BABY chased on the turn angling inside in mid stretch finishing evenly. IRON BERTIE raced evenly lacking more. POLISHED GEM pressed from the inside at the quarter pole then faded in upper stretch.

Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 19 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PONTI PRIDE tracked evenly surging from the far turn, drawing off late. CAJUN BAYOU stalked the pace chasing on the far turn bidding gamely four wide down the lane. HAPPY YEARS sent clear set the pace through the far turn being hooked on the inside in upper stretch wearing down late. GALLIPOLIS slow early gave a mild rally on the far turn racing evenly through the lane. WHY WINCHILL WHY stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch tiring late. MY SWEET LORD was never involved. BLACK BULL played no factor. ALLABOUTBIZ ducked out at the break easing to the wire.

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, surged into lane, drew clear driving,
